<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implement a loop-aware load elimination pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It uses LoopAccessAnalysis to identify loop-carried dependences with a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distance of one between stores and loads.  These form the candidates for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transformation.  The source value of each store then propagated to the user</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the corresponding load.  This makes the load dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The pass can also version the loop and add memchecks in order to prove that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may-aliasing stores can&#39;t change the value in memory before it&#39;s read by the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the dependence from the store to the load has an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// absolute distance of one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// E.g. A&#91;i+1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; (or A&#91;i-1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; for descending loop)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e">isDependenceDistanceOfOne</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution">PredicatedScalarEvolution</a> &amp;PSE,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LoadPtr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>-&gt;getPointerOperand();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;StorePtr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>-&gt;getPointerOperand();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;LoadType = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12126a4bea94833696dc67e0431e829">getLoadStoreType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>-&gt;getDataLayout();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LoadPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5ab2d0b0f0b8ceec3b907184e7567197">getPointerAddressSpace</a>() ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">               StorePtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5ab2d0b0f0b8ceec3b907184e7567197">getPointerAddressSpace</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadType) ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12126a4bea94833696dc67e0431e829">getLoadStoreType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should be a known dependence&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t StrideLoad = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8021a49018596bcbea563e6d5cac9a70">getPtrStride</a>(PSE, LoadType, LoadPtr, L).value&#95;or(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t StrideStore = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8021a49018596bcbea563e6d5cac9a70">getPtrStride</a>(PSE, LoadType, StorePtr, L).value&#95;or(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StrideLoad || !StrideStore || StrideLoad != StrideStore)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: This check for stride values other than 1 and -1 can be eliminated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, doing so may cause the LoopAccessAnalysis to overcompensate,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generating numerous non-wrap runtime checks that may undermine the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// benefits of load elimination. To safely implement support for non-unit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// strides, we would need to ensure either that the processed case does not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// require these additional checks, or improve the LAA to handle them more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// efficiently, or potentially both.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::abs(StrideLoad) != 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TypeByteSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(LoadType));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the index of the instruction according to program order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If a load has multiple candidates associated (i.e. different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stores), it means that it could be forwarding from multiple stores</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// depending on control flow.  Remove these candidates.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Here, we rely on LAA to include the relevant loop-independent dependences.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LAA is known to omit these in the very simple case when the read and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// write within an alias set always takes place using the &#42;same&#42; pointer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// However, we know that this is not the case here, i.e. we can rely on LAA</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to provide us with loop-independent dependences for the cases we&#39;re</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// interested.  Consider the case for example where a loop-independent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dependece S1-&gt;S2 invalidates the forwarding S3-&gt;S2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         A&#91;i&#93;   = ...   (S1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         ...    = A&#91;i&#93;  (S2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         A&#91;i+1&#93; = ...   (S3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LAA will perform dependence analysis here because there are two</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42;different&#42; pointers involved in the same alias set (&amp;A&#91;i&#93; and &amp;A&#91;i+1&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a">removeDependencesFromMultipleStores</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::forward&#95;list&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate&gt; &amp;Candidates) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Store is nullptr it means that we have multiple stores forwarding to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this store.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LoadToSingleCandT =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;LoadInst &#42;, const StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate &#42;&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">    LoadToSingleCandT LoadToSingleCand;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Cand : Candidates) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewElt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">      LoadToSingleCandT::iterator Iter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::tie(Iter, NewElt) =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">          LoadToSingleCand.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Cand.Load, &amp;Cand));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NewElt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &#42;&amp;OtherCand = Iter-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Already multiple stores forward to this load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OtherCand == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle the very basic case when the two stores are in the same block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so deciding which one forwards is easy.  The later one forwards as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// long as they both have a dependence distance of one to the load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cand.Store-&gt;getParent() == OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">            Cand.isDependenceDistanceOfOne(PSE, L) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">            OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e">isDependenceDistanceOfOne</a>(PSE, L)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// They are in the same block, the later one will forward to the load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(Cand.Store))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">            OtherCand = &amp;Cand;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">          OtherCand = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">    Candidates.remove&#95;if(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;Cand) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadToSingleCand&#91;Cand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>&#93; != &amp;Cand) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Given two pointers operations by their RuntimePointerChecking</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We need a check if one is a pointer for a candidate load and the other is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return pointers that are possibly written to on the path from a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// forwarding store to a load.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// These pointers need to be alias-checked against the forwarding candidates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a8ec02c6710c255838a2c5f10e078c8ba"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a8ec02c6710c255838a2c5f10e078c8ba">findPointersWrittenOnForwardingPath</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate&gt;</a> &amp;Candidates) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// From FirstStore to LastLoad neither of the elimination candidate loads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should overlap with any of the stores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// E.g.:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st1 C&#91;i&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ld1 B&#91;i&#93; &lt;-------,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ld0 A&#91;i&#93; &lt;----,  |              &#42; LastLoad</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...           |  |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st2 E&#91;i&#93;      |  |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st3 B&#91;i+1&#93; -- | -&#39;              &#42; FirstStore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st0 A&#91;i+1&#93; ---&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st4 D&#91;i&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st0 forwards to ld0 if the accesses in st4 and st1 don&#39;t overlap with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ld0.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;LastLoad =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab4e6de707bff0fe8081c4da0711bba07">llvm::max&#95;element</a>(Candidates,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Top-level driver for each loop: find store-&gt;load forwarding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// candidates, add run-time checks and perform transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a1b795b0cd98521a7cf4ab769d9207258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a1b795b0cd98521a7cf4ab769d9207258">processLoop</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\nIn \\&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; L-&gt;getHeader()-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getName()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\&quot; checking &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;L &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for store-to-load forwarding cases across the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// backedge. E.g.:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      %x = load %gep&#95;i</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         = ... %x</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      store %y, %gep&#95;i&#95;plus&#95;1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ph:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      %x.initial = load %gep&#95;0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      %x.storeforward = phi &#91;%x.initial, %ph&#93; &#91;%y, %loop&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      %x = load %gep&#95;i            &lt;---- now dead</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         = ... %x.storeforward</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      store %y, %gep&#95;i&#95;plus&#95;1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First start with store-&gt;load dependences.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StoreToLoadDependences = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#ad870908842303e62050abc131f00f91f">findStoreToLoadDependences</a>(LAI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoreToLoadDependences.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Generate an index for each load and store according to the original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// program order.  This will be used later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstOrder = LAI.getDepChecker().generateInstructionOrderMap();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To keep things simple for now, remove those where the load is potentially</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fed by multiple stores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a">removeDependencesFromMultipleStores</a>(StoreToLoadDependences);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoreToLoadDependences.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate, 4&gt;</a> Candidates;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;Cand : StoreToLoadDependences) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Candidate &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Cand);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure that the stored values is available everywhere in the loop in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the next iteration.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#aaf5c3bcafb3f5f0f1a0fd9ddfe9b6e1a">doesStoreDominatesAllLatches</a>(Cand.Store-&gt;getParent(), L, DT))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the load is conditional we can&#39;t hoist its 0-iteration instance to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the preheader because that would make it unconditional.  Thus we would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// access a memory location that the original loop did not access.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a7b98d1a31b5292d6b2f4772277c8147f">isLoadConditional</a>(Cand.Load, L))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether the SCEV difference is the same as the induction step,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thus we load the value in the next iteration.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Cand.isDependenceDistanceOfOne(PSE, L))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check intervening may-alias stores.  These need runtime checks for alias</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// disambiguation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RuntimePointerCheck, 4&gt;</a> Checks = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#abc12092fd1db13a69edf142bcad15556">collectMemchecks</a>(Candidates);</Highlight></CodeLine>
